Articles.Content:
Is there a mod to help fix fuel flow mid flight in 0.90? I've only found 0.25 mods so far. The craft I have is from an updated save, and it seems the latest save version moves fuel lines and struts, so things a off now from what they were. ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-03-11T17:30:00Z" title="03/11/2015 05:30  PM" data-short="9 yr">March 11, 2015</time> by Technical Ben**

[TAC Fuel Balancer](http://kerbal.curseforge.com/ksp-mods/221160-tac-fuel-balancer-v2-4-1-10oct) is a perennial favorite of mine (and a lot of other folks, I'm sure). It's gotten me out of a jam many a time (put me in one to, but through no fault of its own).

Thankyou. I was using VAB based mods, which could not help the flight in progress.

As 0.90 has added so many bugs and breaks to old versions, and it's own setup... I'll have to bite the bullet and rebuild the entire fleets/ships/saves. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

But for now this mod will let me land that one last craft before the save is finished with.

[edit]

Seems it's only 0.25 compatible. ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)
Ignore that - it works just fine in 0.90; I use it my own self.

> 
> Seems it's only 0.25 compatible. ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

There's a working recompiled version linked at the top of the [official thread](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/25823).
